com.spnthreatviz

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spnthreatviz.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database Manager class, handling all direct communication with database. Based on http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/MySQLJava/article.html Referenced http://www.sqlitetutorial.net/sqlite-java/create-table/ Copied from uniText Xchange; heavily modified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseManager()
      Empty constructor for the Database Manager.

      Adds a new CVE entry to the database.

      Creates a new Database associated with the current filename.

      Given a database and a create new table query, add the table to the database.

      Retrieves the CVE Object associated with the provided CVE ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseManager

        public DatabaseManager()
        Empty constructor for the Database Manager. Deprecated.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes all databases by creating the files and setting up all the tables necessary.

      • createCVE

        public static boolean createCVE(CVEObject newCVE)
        Adds a new CVE entry to the database.
        Parameters:
        newCVE - the new entry being added to the database.
        Returns:
        true if the entry was successfully created, false if the entry already exists or if there was another failure.

      • getCVE

        public static CVEObject getCVE(java.lang.String cveID)
        Retrieves the CVE Object associated with the provided CVE ID.
        Parameters:
        cveID - The ID of the CVE to obtain from the database.
        Returns:
        A User Object.

      • validCVE

        public static boolean validCVE(java.lang.String cveID)
        Determines whether a given CVE ID exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        cveID - the CVE ID to verify.
        Returns:
        true if the id is in the database, false otherwise.

      • createNewDatabase

        public static void createNewDatabase(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a new Database associated with the current filename.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the new database. Make sure to include a .db extension.

      • createNewTable

        public static void createNewTable(java.lang.String tableQuery,
                                  java.lang.String databasename)
        Given a database and a create new table query, add the table to the database.
        Parameters:
        tableQuery - The query to create a new table to be added to the database.
        databasename - The database that the table is being added to.

      • purge

        public static void purge()
        Purges database files.
